title: Mottugale Mottugale Lyrics Roja Koottam
stanzas:
Mottugale mottugale
moochu vidaa mottugale
kanmaniyaa thoongugiraal
kaalayil malarungal

pon arumbugal malargayile
men melliya saptham varum
en kadhali
thuyil kalaindhaal
en idhayam thaangaadhu ..

Mottugale mottugale
moochu vidaa mottugale
kadhalan thoongugiraal
kaalayil malarungal

pon arumbugal malargayile
men melliya saptham varum
en kadhalan
thuyil kalaindhaal
en idhayam thaangaadhu ..

unveettu thottam kandu
iravil vandhu saerven
rojakkalai vittu vittu
mutkal thirudi poven

nee aagattum endru sollidvu
un sattayil poovaai
poopen.

Mottugale mottugale
moochu vidaa mottugale
kanmaniyaa thoongugiraal
kaalayil malarungal

pon arumbugal malargayile
men melliya saptham varum
en kadhali
thuyil kalaindhaal
en idhayam thaangaadhu ..

kadhali moochu vidum
kaattrayum segarippen
kadhali micham vaikkum
thaeneer theertham enbaen

kadarkarai manalil namadhu
pergal ezhudhi paarpen.
alai vandhu alli sella
kadali kolla paarpaen.

un netriyil vervai
kandavudan naan
veyilai vetta paarppaen

Mottugale mottugale
moochu vidaa mottugale
kadhalan thoongugiraal
kaalayil malarungal

pon arumbugal malargayile
men melliya saptham varum
en kadhalan
thuyil kalaindhaal
en idhayam thaangaadhu ..
